GENERAL.APP_SHORT_DESCRIPTION: An universal linux app store. Find Snaps, Flatpaks and AppImages!

INITIAL_SETUP.CHECKING_REQUIREMENTS: We are checking if your system have all the requirements
INITIAL_SETUP.RESTART_MODAL_TEXT: The flapak and flathub was installed and you problably needs to restart your computet to finish the flatpak setup
INITIAL_SETUP.CHECK_PACKAGES_MODAL_TITLE: Snapd and flatpak packages are required to install snap and flatpak applications respectively.
INITIAL_SETUP.CHECK_PACKAGES_MODAL_TEXT: Are you sure you want to proceed without installing these packages?

APP_DETAIL.NO_SUPPORT_ERROR_MESSAGE: Looks like you not configured support to {{type}} packages. Please, verify your setup.

APPEARANCE.TITLE: Appearance
APPEARANCE.UI_MODE_CHANGED_MESSAGE_BODY: The application must be restarted to show the changes

GET_INVOLVED.TITLE: Get involved
GET_INVOLVED.CALL_TO_ACTION: There are too many ways to get involved in App Outlet project and help us to build the software that you use and love.

BUGS.TITLE: Reporting bugs
BUGS.DESCRIPTION: If something is wrong when you is using App Outlet you can report it to us on our Github repository.
BUGS.DESCRIPTION_2: Feel free to report bugs, instabilities, spelling errors or even make suggestions. We carefully evaluate each one of them.

COMMUNITY.TITLE: Being active on App Outlet community
COMMUNITY.DESCRIPTION: We love interaction. Please follow us on Twitter to get some news about us. Send a message on Gitter or on Telegram if you prefer.

CODING.TITLE: Coding
CODING.DESCRIPTION: Help us to improve the features and stability of our beloved app. All you need is love and a little bit of Javascript.

DONATING.TITLE: Donating
DONATING.DESCRIPTION: We need help to mantain the infrastructure and we don't have sponsors. Feel free to support us on the platforms above
